roulette.title: Roulette with Elimination Principle
roulette.addItemsToStart: Add items to start the game
roulette.itemRemoved: Item has been removed from the roulette!
roulette.allItemsRemoved: All items have been removed from the roulette
roulette.lastItemRemaining: This is the last remaining item
roulette.gameWillEnd: This will be the final item!
roulette.addMoreItemsToContinue: Add more items to continue playing
